p: The C. elegans synchronized in the L4 stage was placed in NGM containing drugs of different mass concentrations, 3 NGM per group, 10 C. elegans per NGM, and control group was set up. In the drug-administered group, C. elegans was treated with drug for 24 h and placed in a 35 °C incubator at the same time as the control group. The death number and survival number of C. elegans were counted every 12 h until all the C. elegans died. The death standard is described above [ 21]. Survival graphs were according to literature [ 22].
